overall_summary: The reasoning demonstrates a pragmatic approach focused on leveraging observed patterns and data limitations. It prioritizes simplicity due to the small dataset (96 hourly points) and emphasizes handling day-of-week seasonality. The analyst avoids complex models like ARIMA or ETS in favor of a tailored averaging method that accounts for weekday/weekend differences, ensuring the forecast aligns with the upcoming period.

Lower values on weekends compared to weekdays
